overview:
Denis Dovgopoliy is a leading member of the Ukrainian VC and enterpreneurial community. Denis is Founder and Managing Director of BayView Innovations. BayView Innovations is a consulting company, dedicated to developing venture investment market in Ukraine by providing services to developers of promising commercial projects: finding financing for early stages of project development and rising projectâ€™s attractiveness for potential investors. BVI team has substantial experience in managing international projects, broad partner network in the Silicon Valley (California, USA) and has a deep understanding of Ukraineâ€™s high-tech potential. Companyâ€™s mission is to educate and develop venture investment market in Ukraine, create image of Ukraine as a country with high RD potential, capable of creating competitive tech companies on global markets.

Denis involved into Silicon Valley Open Doors Conference (Mountain View, California, USA), BIT (Moscow, Russia), Moscow Venture Forum (Moscow Russia), EMPEC (Moscow, Russia) as person who responsible for communications with Ukraine, he is was co-organizer of Investment Panel at Central and Eastern European Outsourcing Forum, Startup Crash Tests (Kiev), Blogcamp CEE, Investor Day CEE, Seedcamp Eastern Europe. He is board and advisory board member of numerous startups. Denis is author his personal blog about Ukrainian VC’s and High-Tech entrepreneurs community in Ukraine/

Mr. Dovgopoliy is ideologist and organizer of seminars series â€œSilicon Valley Best Practice. Kiev Master Classesâ€ and co-organizer of Management Tour to Silicon Valley “Future of IT marketplace. New information Era. How to answer its challenge?”
